message.raw:
Add `_{script_basename}` to default `filename_prefix_format`. It was intended
to be there in the recent sequence index changes, but I mistakenly left it out.
Without it, shots from different scripts aren't so easily identifiable in lyse,
even though the filepath contains the script name in the folder hierarchy

message:
Add `_{script_basename}` to default `filename_prefix_format`. It was intended
to be there in the recent sequence index changes, but I mistakenly left it out.
Without it, shots from different scripts aren't so easily identifiable in lyse,
even though the filepath contains the script name in the folder hierarchy
